column4: i just installed flash 10 and about:plugins lists shockwave flash and yet flash still doesnt work...
it worked fine on 7.1 til flash 10 =(
enable partner repos and refresh package list. flash-plugin should be there
this is what happens if you try apt-get that Package adobe-flashplugin is not available, but is referred to by another package.
do you have partner repos enabled?
honestly im not sure how to add an alternate repo
start synaptic, use settings menu, select "repositories", go to third party software tab, check the box in line with partner
then close, refresh list of packages. adobe-flashplugin should be there
found that plugin? I'm pretty curious :)
